title: Mathematical Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Program Using Virtual Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: Educational program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to improve practical skills by solving mathematical problems encountered in real work environments through virtual simulation games.

learning_goals: Learners can mathematically model and solve real-world job-related problems presented in virtual simulation games.
Learners can improve problem-solving strategies by exchanging feedback with peers in an online learning community through in-game collaborative activities.
Learners can reflectively evaluate their mathematical thinking processes by analyzing game performance data and develop future learning plans.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
